Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.service

package com.fssa.librarymanagement.service
This package has classes that manage different parts of the library system. It includes services for handling users, books, and borrow modules.

The classes in this package contain logics for their specific jobs.

The services offered in this package are like register users, add books, and list borrowed books. These services work together with the data access layer (DAOs) to provide an easy way to do library tasks.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fssa.librarymanagement
    This package is like the main control room of the Library Management System.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BookService
    This class provides services related to book management, such as adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting books.
    BorrowService
    This class provides services related to borrowing and returning books.
    UserService
    This class provides services related to user management, such as register, login, list, update, and delete.
